videos.description: James Banks has the lane for a wide open dunk to extend the lead for Texas in the first half
videos.headline: Texas' James Banks slams one home

videos.description: Jacob Young finishes off the fast break going up-and-under for a wild shot high off the backboard for the bucket and the foul.
videos.headline: Young hits the reverse circus shot layup and-one for Texas

videos.description: Kendal Yancy gets the ball off the inbounds play and converts the lay-in, plus the foul
videos.headline: Texas' Yancy hits tough lay-up on top of getting fouled

videos.description: Shawn Johnson hits the lay-in and gets fouled to help cut the Texas lead to 5 points
videos.headline: Incarnate Word's Johnson keeps it close with and-one finish

videos.description: Jalin Hart drives to the hoop after a missed Texas shot to cut the Texas lead to 64-62
videos.headline: Hart drive puts Incarnate Word within two

videos.description: Sam Burmeister makes three-point jumper to put Incarnate Word ahead by a point
videos.headline: Burmeister gives Incarnate Word late lead

videos.description: Nursing only a one point lead, Texas gets a pair of layups in the final minute to help fight off Incarnate Word for a 77-73 win.
videos.headline: Two late layups helps Texas escape Incarnate Word
